heading: What services do i offer?
content:
• UI Development

    Build the website' UI using a variety of editing tools such as Figma and Photoshop.

  • Frontend Development

    Implementation of graphic design and UI elements

  • Headless Content Management

    Customing an existing CMS platform that best works for you.

  • Backend Development

    Server-side logic, database and API development.

heading: How long does a project take?
content: The duration of the project will depend on its complexity. For a typical one-page site, it could take approximately 1-2 weeks, taking into account the complexity of the design. However, for larger projects, the timeline can extend to several months to ensure thorough completion.

heading: Who pays for hosting, domain, etc.?
content: This will depend on your preference. Most clients prefer to have these costs included as operational costs (along with additional maintenance costs), which I would charge to you. However, if you prefer to manage your own hosting and domain, we can certainly make arrangements accordingly.

heading: How does the payment work? What's the rate?
content: The rate will depend on the complexity of the project. Typically, my rate ranges from $10 to $15 per hour. However, we can also discuss the possibility of a one-time payment. For a single page on a static site, the cost would be between $150 and $200, depending on the complexity of the page. Payment methods available include PayPal, Gcash, and Direct Bank Transfer.
